name: df-lsp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clspn, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cint(crab(s2, cfv(clss, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ LSpan =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))↦ ⋂ { s2 ∈(LSubSp ` s0)| s1 ⊆ s2 }))
comment: Define span of a set of vectors of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)
